page.title: 04WESTFIELD FARM,EAST COKER.
page.content:
{ Westfield Farm}is in the west of the area.The farm is at an altitude of {325ft.}and the slopes are gentle.The soil is{medium clay}which is fairly heavy but drains well.
{ Beef}animals are reared at the farm and they are mainly{FriesianXHereford. Nurse cows are kept for rearing the calves which are sold from 20 months to 2 years old.There are about{160 {sheep.
They grow{grass,wheat and barley. Most of the barley is kept for feed for the livestock.The{silage}is stored under a silo with straw or hay on top for the winter.They rent about 15 acres of{grass keep}from Coker Court.
